name: Comet Shower
description:
Made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam with Joined Together as a theme.

You are the Moon and your mission is to protect Earth from the big rocks from space!

Whenever you get hit with an asteroid, it is now stuck to you! But be careful with the big one, as it will destroy a handful of your rocks.

Challenge: try to make an asteroid belt around the Earth!

Arrow keys to move Moon around Earth.

Right - Clockwise / Left - Counterclockwise

Space to begin/restart

My first "released" game and also my first completed project.
